ovdesc.p: This screen is used to setup various Sources from which a message is received in Payments hub. A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or delete a record in store table, PPT.SOURCE.

desc.p: Describes the source configured in free text.
Indicates the group to which the source belongs. This field is used exclusively in Product Determination process in payments hub.
The value links to field 'SourceProduct' in PPT.SOURCEPRODUCTGROUP.
Indicates the group to which the source belongs.
The value links to field 'SourceProduct' in PPT.SOURCEPRODUCTGROUP.
Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
Relates to the channel through which messages from a source can be received.
10 alphanumeric characters.The field links to field 'ChannelName' in PPT.CHANNEL
Used for internal purpose.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the previous live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
